name: Sword and Whispers
description:
In this game you play as a young traveler who left home to find their own way in the world. Recently, their dreams have been filled with a mysterious black ooze and unknown distant cries for help. One morning they wake up to find a finely crafted magic sword lying beside them, and it seems to be calling to them. As they continue on their journey they follow the messages in their dreams, along with a gut feeling that they can only attribute to their new sword. Eventually they find themselves in Scarbour Forest, according to villages across the land, our hero should avoid it at all costs. Just beyond this forest is the old fallen kingdom named the Equathen Empire.  Our hero decides to continue into the forest to better understand what their dreams truly mean and how their destiny connected to this kingdom. 

After fighting their way through many undead and slimy enemies that plague the village and castle grounds, our hero discovers the old King is still alive! They were taken over by the Disgusting Anomaly, which feats on the king and the kingdom’s souls.

Our hero is the chosen and they are the only one who can defeat this monstrosity and restore the Equathen Empire to its former glory!

Controls: "WASD" or "Arrow" Keys for movement, "F" to shoot, and "Space" to jump
